alert.note: Alert for Lehigh; Northampton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:06AM EST until December 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Lehigh River At Walnutport affecting Northampton and Lehigh Counties. For the Lehigh River...including Walnutport...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lehigh River at Walnutport. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Minor flooding begins downstream at Catasaqua and Hokendaqua. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.5 feet on 09/17/1999. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (1 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Stg Time Date Lehigh River Walnutport 8.0 8.0 Mon 9 am 5.7 4.8 8.0 1pm 12/18 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM EST.
